author: Chen et al. (2024)
title: Energy Grid GIS Analysis
findings: Significant evidence of load-balancing improvements using GIS spatial modeling.

author: Roberts (2023)
title: Socio-Technical Energy Shifts
findings: Determined that community trust is the primary bottleneck for new network adoption.
